title: Lots of Work to Win a Rook!
pgn:
[Date "????.??.??"]
[Result "*"]
[FEN "rn2k2r/pp3p1p/3b4/qNpPpN2/8/8/PPP3PP/R2QK2R w KQkq - 0 1"]

1. b4 ( 1. Qd2 Bc7 { And everything holds... }  ) Qxb4+ ( 1... Qxb5 2. Nxd6+ Ke7 3. Nxb5 ) 2. c3 Qe4+ { Has to keep checking - the bishop is in trouble! }  3. Qe2 Qxe2+ ( 3... Qxf5 4. Nxd6+ Kf8 5. Nxf5 ) 4. Kxe2 Be7 5. Nc7+ Kd7 6. Nxa8 { And white is up a rook! }
*

title: You Can Win This...

*

title: Get Yourself an Extra Bishop!
pgn:
[Date "????.??.??"]
[Result "*"]
[FEN "2k5/1ppr2p1/p1n3bp/7q/3prP2/PP1B2Q1/1KPBR2P/3R4 w KQkq - 0 1"]

1. Rde1 { Threatening the rook }  ( 1. Bxe4 { ?? Bad move! }  1... Qxe2 2. Qxg6 Qxd1 ) 1... Rxe2 ( 1... Rde7 2. Bxe4 Bxe4 3. Rxe4 Rxe4 4. Rxe4 { And white has won a piece. }  ) 2. Bxe2 ( 2. Rxe2 Bxd3 3. cxd3 Qxe2 ) Qf5 3. Bd3 Qf6 4. Qxg6 { And white has an extra piece. }
*

title: More Crazy Knights
pgn:
[Date "????.??.??"]
[Result "*"]
[FEN "r3rk2/2b3pn/1p6/1Pp1N3/2N1bP2/1Q1P2q1/1B2B3/1K1R4 w - - 0 1"]

1. Nd6 { Threating mate and the bishop on e4. }  1... Bg6 2. Nf5 Qg2 { Giving up mate instead of the queen. }  ( 2... Bxf5 3. Qf7# ) 3. Nd7#
*

title: How to Punish Black...
pgn:
[Date "????.??.??"]
[Result "*"]
[FEN "r3kb1r/1ppqnppp/p1bp4/5P1Q/2P5/8/PPB2PPP/RNB1R1K1 w kq - 0 1"]

1. f6 gxf6 { Black must capture or lose the knight.  }  2. Bf5 { White keeps black from escaping by castling queenside! The bishop cannot be taken of course because the knight is pinned.  }  2... Qd8 3. Be6 Ng6 ( 3... Qb8 4. Qxf7+ Kd8 5. Qxf6 { And the rook is lost as well... }  ) 4. Bd7+ { Not an easy move to find!  }  4... Kxd7 5. Qf5#
*

title: Can White Save the Piece??
pgn:
[Date "????.??.??"]
[Result "*"]
[FEN "6k1/R4p1p/b5p1/1q1P4/4Q2P/2b3N1/5PP1/2r1B1K1 w - - 0 1"]

1. Kh2 { The king moves away from the pin! }  1... Rxe1 ( 1... Bxe1 { This is worse for black. }  2. Qf4 Qe8 { To stop checkmate... }  3. Qxc1 ) 2. Qf3 Qe8 ( 2... Qc4 { Trying to protect the bishop? }  3. Qxf7+ Kh8 4. Qxh7# ) 3. Qxc3 { White keeps the extra pawn and a great position! }
*

*
